title: Thinking about inting lol.
body: Riot perm banned this account after 5 months of good behavior I had one incident where I got salty because someone intentionally banned my champion and I banned theirs. I’ve been thinking about making new accounts and just acting bad and ruining everyone’s games because that’s basically what riot did to me, a loyal player since 2012 with over 700 usd spent on one account banned, the only way to get back at them is to obliterate noobs so they don’t play anymore, call me a kid but riot is more toxic than any of us, they put all people in iron now LOL good way to get new players to stay riot!!! PUT THEM WITH SMURFS HAHA. But ya I’m just going to ruin the game for everyone, I wasn’t toxic for 5 months but riot wants to use a robot to ban me for someone tilting me by intentionally banning my champ and stating it. Bots don’t see the whole story. Anyways thanks riot. I’m going to ruin your player base little by little, hopefully more people join me in the fight against unfair bot perm bans.

"With that in mind I can definitely see this getting a chat restriction under normal circumstances, but unfortunately for you since you had a 14-day ban and apparently didn't change/improve your behavior enough you were hit with the next available punishment-a permaban in this case."

He also didn't tell you to try to repeal it. He said you could try that. That's different. He explained what your only option was. That doesn't mean he thinks they should return the account to you. It's just the only thing you have left to try.

You do realize that by doing so you've proven Riot's assessment of you was correct, right?
